Html:
So I'm feeling like the documentation is tremendously light and the samples are tremendously overwhelming.

I saw another post where someone asked about MySql integration and the only reply was a flippant one about "just look at the samples/source code."

I've messed around with binding ItemSource and other properties to datatables in my dataset but to no avail.

May I please get a very elementary example of binding a datatable to a chart?

thanks!
